channels.description: channel(s) set, and their resulting configuration

fee_base_msat.description: The resulting feebase (this is the BOLT #7 name)

fee_proportional_millionths.description: The resulting feeppm (this is the BOLT #7 name)

minimum_htlc_out_msat.description: The resulting htlcmin we will advertize (the BOLT #7 name is htlc_minimum_msat)

warning_htlcmin_too_low.description: The requested htlcmin was too low for this peer, so we set it to the minimum they will allow

maximum_htlc_out_msat.description: The resulting htlcmax we will advertize (the BOLT #7 name is htlc_maximum_msat)

warning_htlcmax_too_high.description: The requested htlcmax was greater than the channel capacity, so we set it to the channel capacity
